ComicInfo.Title: The Date; Mistaken Identity; Grammy Hooker's Benefit; Bondage Palace, Part 1
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 17:23:44. [CVDB316296] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 23:57:57. [Issue ID 761885]
ComicInfo.Writer: Carlos Trillo,Eduardo Maicas,Franco Saudelli,Stefano Gaudiano,Carlos Trillo,Eduardo Maicas,Franco Saudelli,Stefano Gaudiano
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Date: Betty services a gangster while a rival gangster shoots at their moving car.
Mistaken Identity: The wrong person shows up for Betty's Dominatrix appointment.
Grammy Hooker's Benefit: Betty stages a fashion show with fetish fashions as a benefit to raise money for a retiring prostitute.
Bondage Palace, Part 1: The Blonde is hired by Popess Crimilda to find and obtain an eternal youth formula from one of four tenants of the Lonely Babylonia apartment building. But while she busies herself with a pair of Russian weightlifters, two other burglars are in the same building, in the apartment of actress Amita Berg.
